title: Name changing
body: I would like to name change, but someone inactive has the name. Could you guys disable his account?

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is spot on, you'll have to wait for the summoner name to become *inactive* before you have a chance to snag it up. You can read more about how this works in our [**Inactive Summoner Name Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Each account is given 1 month of protection per level (6 months minimum). After that many months of inactivity, then the name is up for grabs by anyone. So, whatever level the account is, that's how many months since their last played game was you will have to wait until the name becomes available.
